name: Garlic Shrimp & Zucchini
description: Ready in 15 minutes, low calorie but protein-packed quick meal.

instructions.instruction: Pat shrimp dry with paper towels, season with salt.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over high heat.
Arrange shrimp in a single layer. Don't touch for 2 minutes.
instructions.tip: Don't overcrowd, cook in batches if needed.

instructions.instruction: Flip shrimp, cook 1 more minute. Remove to a plate.
Add butter and garlic to the same pan. Saut√© 30 seconds.
Add zucchini noodles, toss for 2 minutes.
Return shrimp to pan, add lemon juice and pepper flakes.
Toss everything together, garnish with parsley.

tips: Shrimp is a very low-calorie protein source.
Zucchini noodles replace pasta - keto friendly.
One of the quickest athlete meals.
storageInfo: Best served fresh. Can be refrigerated for 1 day.
variations: Add pasta for a more filling meal.
